description.originalText: Debbie is amazing! We needed help with our newborn. Debbie truly cared about our baby and we could trust her, she is punctual and clean, greatly followed all the routines & our inputs, and also brought her experience and knowledge to the table which we appreciated as first-time parents. Highly recommend Debbie!

Debbie took care of our daughter for 3 years (from 9 months old to 3.5 years old) and during that time she was an exceptional caretaker to the highest degree.  She was punctual, kind, extremely patient, and she went above and beyond to make sure our child felt loved and cared for.   We aspired for a caretaker that didn't just babysit our daughter, but take an investment in making sure she was hitting all of her development milestones and prepared her for school.  Debbie did all of those things including helping her learn to walk, talk, learn her colors, numbers and letters, and play well with others by planning play dates with children they met throughout the day.  Debbie treated my daughter like her own and she became like family.   In addition to her wonderful caretaking skills, Debbie was also extremely diligent about cleanliness, washing hands and toys on a regular basis and making sure that my daughter learned the importance of cleaning herself and cleaning her spaces.  Debbie was a joy to work with and my daughter misses her immensely.    Anyone would be lucky to have her as their child's caretaker and you should reach out to Debbie immediately if you want your child in the best hands.

description.displayText: Debbie was the first nanny we hired for our child when he was six months old and she is a truly exceptional nanny. She was patient, caring, energetic, hands on and extremely organized. She would read to him and talk with him all the time, engage him in activities, arrange impromptu play dates with other kids in the playground. Under her care our child flourished, he met all the milestones before time. She also prepared healthy and yummy food for our child, so he grew up loving to eat fruits and vegetable. We were blessed to have found her, our child is still very fond of her and asks about her whenever he sees old pictures.

description.displayText: We got lucky with Debbie. She is patient, caring, punctual and skilled at managing our almost 2 and 3 year old daughters, who are very energetic and can be a handful. She brought her years of personal and professional experience to bear in caring for our girls with a smile, which included feeding them meals, putting them into naps, bath time, playing with them, reading them storybooks, coloring books and toilet training for the eldest girl. While it was only for two weeks, we will definitely be asking her to babysit in the future when she is available.
description.originalText: We got lucky with Debbie. She is patient, caring, punctual and skilled at managing our almost 2 and 3 year old daughters, who are very energetic and can be a handful. While it was only for two weeks, we will definitely be asking her to babysit in the future when she is available.

description.displayText: Debbie started caring for my daughter since she was born for almost 2 years and is part of our family now. For a FTM who didn't have any family around, she was God-sent. As a mother of 3 she knows how to care for children from infancy to toddler hood and beyond. Her passion for what she does is evident from all she does around kids. She has given my daughter so much love and attention. She helped put her on a schedule and stayed consistent with all that I asked her regarding sleep, feeding schedules and discipline. She truly helped my daughter thrive by reading to her, engaging her in sensory games, arranging play dates outside while maintaining social distancing during Covid. Thanks to her my daughter managed to make friends while staying safe. She is fully vaccinated and has been taking all safety precautions very seriously. She is extremely clean, punctual and very trustworthy. Honestly, any family would be lucky to have her.

description.displayText: She is extremely professional and very punctual. She was taking care of my son since the time he was 5 months old till the time he turned one. My contract at work got over otherwise i would've never let her go. She is very loving and caring towards the kids and is very interactive with them. She want an extra mile to make my son walk . I would definitely recommend her.

description.displayText: Debbie has been our nanny for two years now.  She has cared for my daughter since she was 2 years old.  Debbie has been reliable, dependable, honest, and hardworking.   She truly enjoys working with children, and that shows in her work. My daughter adores her.  Debbie is always willing to help around the house.  We are moving to the suburbs, and unfortunately Debbie has decided not to commute there, but we wish her the best. Any family would be lucky to have her!

description.displayText: Debbie cared for our son from 3 months until 7 months. She is extremely professional and very responsible. She has a great work ethic and felt very comfortable leaving our little guy under her care. It was obvious that he enjoyed his time with her. Any family would be lucky to have her work with them.

description.displayText: Debbie interviewed for a babysitting job I posted on Care.com.  Although my needs changed and we didn't work together long-term, I find Debbie to be very professional.  I appreciated her promptness and attention to detail.  She takes her job seriously which is great!

description.displayText:
She is a very dependable caregiver. She is friendly and cooperative. I truly enjoy having her around watching my children.
 I will continue to use her services. I consider her a friend of the family.
